title: Rip: a Remix Manifesto. Chapter 1
description:
From: http://www3.nfb.ca/webextension/rip-a-remix-manifesto/

People have been looking for downloadable copies of the Chapters from RIP: a Remix Manifesto, but since there aren't any provided by the owners, it's time we started to create our own.

I had a really difficult time finding a good way to get the video. I tried downloading and converting the flash files from the project website, but that didn't want to work. In the end I just tried various screen capture programs until I got a reasonable copy. This was created with CamStudio 2.0 on Windows 2000.
http://camstudio.org/

Due to the sketchy nature of the recording, this isn't exactly a high fidelity recording. There's a boarder of the screen space around the video as it plays and I'm not certain of the quality of the recording. It plays fine on the video software that comes with CamStudio, but there are green lines all over the place when I play it on VLC. As such, this is more a proof of concept than anything. 

(As for seeding, I'll do my best, but this computer is in my bedroom, so it turns off when I have to sleep. I'll get cracking on finding other computers to use.)

Others in this series:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4790788/Rip__a_Remix_Manifesto._Chapter_1
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4790788/Rip__a_Remix_Manifesto._Chapter_2
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4790788/Rip__a_Remix_Manifesto._Chapter_3
(any future uploads will be the same name, with just the last number changed)
